description: Tell Brak, located in the Upper Khabur of northeastern Syria, was occupied between the sixth and second millennia BCE. The tell stands ca. 40 m tall and covers ca. 130 hectares.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Brak, SYR

properties.description: Tell Brak was occupied between the sixth and second millennia BC. Location based on OpenStreetMap.
